name: Caution: Exploding Zombies
description:
Caution: Exploding Zombies is a twin-stick zombie shooter where the enemies are weapons. Run around an industrial complex, use different weapons and items to survive, and keep your distance from the exploding ones.

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Aim - Mouse

Items:
- Health Pack
- Exploding Barrel
- Pistol
- Rifle
- Shotgun

- Zombie
- Exploding Zombie

This was game 2 of 4 I made for my personal June challenge. Developed in 10 Days
